Or what can it be caused by?[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/5E78cygXwe2yXLrFsBeX0zKdqWnPHA2Jkng2YAlPEIIyAlXiDpZr9pgs08dzBRDviv4eOd7SnjEMjYwjin6o0zuAdgLyFHsX/error.jpg)
topic: 1. Solution exception:'bool' object has no attribute 'upper'

replies.body:
As far as i remember close Gh/Rhino and restart from fresh. Or before that try to (right click) recompute the solution.

-A.
Does not work .... I'll try a restart ..just in case

Is the file updated?

Uploading it can be more useful.

-A.
well i thought it was now i tried it on a simple geometry and it says that I should update HB - will try that now

Hi Stefania, Hi Abraham Stefania, can you post the file here? The problem is something like this: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/5E78cygXwe0hlra9kDpNwDZ3uCYz-d0u8ql19Ip5*Rs7bnpyYeAvZy1wugTXUuTM6z-3tpIMAd1DP5ymcNj0Pu4-F5mDj3hA/upper_error.png) Probably, some Boolean variables in your component have the "uppercase function". Best  Antonello
Here is the file, if you manage to fix it i would appreciate a print screen on how to solve it ...

Hi Stefania, the error is because you have connected a boolean parameter to altConstruction_. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/5E78cygXwe1bgfJOkp4Z6e6agesWRXe3kmWszyXmBDr6KZX5Z-fRtP8ineMiXAPIeHgS9nSuqJYCKX32ESnVGyxd9rSv5D9s/error_01.png) Besides, I suggest you: 1) update your LB HB. The current version is the March version. 2) draw shadows surfaces in different way, much more schematic, in this way you could increase the speed of the calculation. If you want take a look here: [http://nrel.github.io/EnergyPlus/Tips_and_Tricks_Using_EnergyPlus/T...](http://nrel.github.io/EnergyPlus/Tips_and_Tricks_Using_EnergyPlus/Tips_and_Tricks_Using_EnergyPlus/) Best Antonello
